newsitem.title: USA: Global semiconductor index to replace book-to-bill.
newsitem.headline: Global semiconductor index to replace book-to-bill.

text.p: The Semiconductor Industry Association said it will replace its current monthly book-to-bill report in January 1997 with new monthly statistics that report industry sales on a worldwide basis.

For months, industry executives and analysts had been complaining that the headline book-to-bill figure, which covers only business in the Americas, was too narrow in representing only about one third of the global chip market.
The U.S. industry group said the new program would provide a better summary of the worldwide market than the book-to-bill ratio, which it has published since 1978.
